verbs.description: The press [V: has] gone into hyperbolic overdrive criticizing the Trump administration for separating families caught illegally crossing into the U.S. from Mexico . They clearly want the public , against all evidence , to believe that questionable processing of illegal - immigrant children and their families only began after Donald Trump took office last year .
